title: There is things such as music. Why is it so powerful? - Quora

response.answer_text: When musicians write music, they put their emotion into it. That emotion transfers through the song, into your ears, and to your heart. Listening to the song, you can feel the same emotion that the musician put into the song. That’s why music is powerful. It can hold an emotion, and relay it, over and over again. It’s kinda amazing, if you think about it.
